content: कृत्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृ-क्यप्; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. III. 1. 120</ls>] {@--1@} What should or ought to be done, right, proper, fit. {@--2@} Feasible, practicable. {@--3@} Who may be seduced from allegiance, treacherous; <ls>Rāj. T. 5. 247.</ls> --त्यं {@--1@} What ought to be done, duty, function; <ls>Ms. 2. 237</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 67.</ls> {@--2@} Work, business, deed, commission; बंधुकृत्यं <ls>Me. 114</ls>; अन्योन्यकृत्यैः <ls>Ś. 7. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Purpose, object, end; कूजद्भिरापादितवंशकृत्यं <ls>R. 2. 12</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 15.</ls> {@--4@} Motive, cause. --त्यः A class of affixes used to form potential (future) passive participle; these are तव्य, अनीय, य and also एलिम. --त्या {@--1@} Action, deed. {@--2@} Magic. {@--3@} A female deity to whom sacrifices are offered for destruetive and magical purposes.
